member.name: T:Kentico.Activities.Web.Mvc.KenticoActivityLoggerController
member.summary: Controller responsible for activity logging via javascript. Provides method for logging an activity and method which returns script which logs activity via javascript AJAX on client side.
member.remarks: Call routes.Kentico().MapActivitiesRoutes(); before you register all your routes. Furthermore, include script tag in your layout @Scripts.Render(Url.RouteUrl("KenticoLogActivityScript")) which is @Scripts.Render("Kentico.Resource/Activities/Logger/Logger.js") or create AJAX post request Kentico.Activities/Logger/Log. Make sure that the AJAX call is performed at every page all required fields are filled correctly ().

member.name: T:Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions
member.summary: Provides extension methods related to Kentico ASP.NET MVC integration features.

member.name: M:Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.ApplicationBuilderExtensions.UseEmailTracking(Kentico.Web.Mvc.IApplicationBuilder,Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.EmailTrackingOptions)
member.summary: Enables the opened email and email link tracking feature.
member.param: The application builder.
Email tracking options.
member.remarks: Enabling the opened email and email link tracking feature prepares routes to be mapped once is called. Inherently this method must be called prior to system routes mapping.

member.name: T:Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.EmailTrackingOptions
member.summary: Options configuring the feature.

member.name: P:Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.EmailTrackingOptions.EmailLinkHandlerRouteUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL where handler responsible for tracking clicked links in emails is mapped. See the remarks section when using non-default URL. The default value is .
member.remarks: The Kentico administration application uses to obtain tracking URLs when sending emails. When non-default URL is used, the method has to be customized accordingly.

member.name: P:Kentico.Newsletters.Web.Mvc.EmailTrackingOptions.OpenedEmailHandlerRouteUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL where handler responsible for tracking opened emails is mapped. See the remarks section when using non-default URL. The default value is .
member.remarks: The Kentico administration application uses to obtain tracking URLs when sending emails. When non-default URL is used, the method has to be customized accordingly.

member.summary: Maps handler responsible for tracking opened emails to .
member.param: The object that provides extensibility for .
URL where handler responsible for tracking opened emails is mapped. See the remarks section when using non-default URL.
member.remarks: The Kentico administration application uses to obtain tracking URLs when sending emails. When non-default URL for is used, the method has to be customized accordingly.
member.returns: Route where handler responsible for tracking opened emails is mapped.
